properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SALARY FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE ENT_YN = 'N' AND EMP_ID = ?
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMAIL, EMP_NO, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE WHERE ENT_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TBL_EMPLOYEE SET EMAIL = ?, PHONE = REPLACE(REPLACE(?, ' ', ''), '-', '') WHERE EMP_ID = ?
